Description.Text:
Gezi Hotel Bosphorus is a brand new hotel, which opened its doors in September 2010 and a design business & leisure hotel at the Taksim Square in downtown Istanbul facing the Bosphorus as you step into the lobby. Gezi Hotel Bosphorus have from now on 67 Rooms instead of 63 , 11 of this ones are Suites. All rooms have air conditioning, IP TVs with wireless keyboards, wooden floors, and marble bathrooms. Both rooms and bathrooms have mood lighting and spectacular Bosphorus and park views. Molton Brown bath products, Bathroom Phone, High quality linen and interior decorating, IP Television and 2+1 surround system, Complimentary high-speed wi-fi internet connection, Touch operated fixture and ambiance lighting, Air conditioning Sound proofing, Mini-bar, Direct line telephones with voice mail, Express check-in/check-out, Digital safe box, Hair dryer, Self-operated remote panel for in room functions, Ring bell on the doors. Guests can make use of Gezi Hotels extensive spa and wellness facilities, where a variety of massage and wellness treatments are available. There is also a fully equipped gym.
The Hotel also offers Dry cleaning, Lobby and Reception.
Panoramic Bosphorus and Istanbul, Walking distance to Istanbul Lutfi Kirdar Convention & Exhibition Centre, Istanbul Congress Center, Beyoglu and Nisantasi Shopping and Entertainment facilities.

Sky Suites - One or two bedroom suites varying 60 to 80 sq meters, overlooking amazing Bosphorus & Istanbul Private terraces with smoked vintage teak flooring. Comfy outdoor furniture, bose sound decks Spacious rooms with 3,5 m ceiling heights. Some of them have Fireplace, Jacuzzi with stunning Bosphorus view and Private bar. Floor to ceiling anti-reflection panoramic windows, Nespresso Machines,Internet/IP TV with 160 channels, Free Internet 100 mb/s via fibre optics,Mitsubishi VRV A/C system, Latex Double Bed with satin linens and down pillows, Molton Brown Bathroom Amenities, Natural Italian marble bathrooms. Extra bed is available upon request.
Double or Twin with Park/Garden View - When you step in a park room, you will be charmed with the touch of green in room. Interactive Power TV in the room offers movie options, 160 channels and free music albums. If you would like to check your e-mails, you don't have to turn on your computer. With our wireless keyboards, you can easily use tis 32" Flat TV as a web browser. If you need to print a page, just push the print button. Here you are welcomed with in room business centre. Complimentary Wi -Fi, speaker phone with voicemail, data port are other facilities for your comfort.A stylish and chic bathroom with separate shower and toilet offers a glass wall in shower, 4 pack Molton Brown products, rain shower and sound system.
Deluxe Double with Bosphorus View - Deluxe Bosphorus room offers you simply a wonderful view of sea and Bosphorus Bridge. Interactive Power TV in the room offers movie options, 160 channels and free music albums. If you would like to check your e-mails, you don't have to turn on your computer. With our wireless keyboards, you can easily use tis 32" Flat TV as a web browser. If you need to print a page, just push the print button. Here you are welcomed with in room business centre. Complimentary Wi -Fi, speaker phone with voicemail, data port are other facilities for your comfort A stylish and chic full marble bathroom with separate shower and toilet offers a glass wall in shower, 5 pack Molton Brown products, rain shower and sound system.
Junior Suite with Bosphorous View - Green or blue? If you cannot decide on, this room is ideally located on the corner, and have a park and Bosphorus view at the same time. Interactive Power TV in the room offers movie options, 160 channels and free music albums. If you would like to check your e-mails, you don't have to turn on your computer. With our wireless keyboards, you can easily use tis 32" Flat TV as a web browser. If you need to print a page, just push the print button. Here you are welcomed with in room business centre. Complimentary Wi -Fi, speaker phone with voicemail, data port are other facilities for your comfort. A stylish and chic full marble bathroom with separate shower and toilet, 4 pack Molton Brown products, rain shower and sound system.
